aboutMe.description1: I am a Front-end deverloper based in Katzelsdorf, Austria. I help designers and companies to bring their ideas to real life. Creativity and logical thinking are skills that I have developed to connect ideas into quality products.
aboutMe.description2: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

portfolio.description: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.

projects.1: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.2: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.3: Based on Slack, this app offers a user-friendly platform for optimizing team communication. Real-time messages and a structured channel organization make communication within the team noticeably easier.
projects.4: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

privacyPolicy.introduction1: In the following data protection declaration we inform you about the most important aspects of data processing on our website. We collect and process personal data only on the basis of legal provisions (General Data Protection Regulation, Telecommunications Act 2003).
privacyPolicy.introduction2: As soon as you, as a user, access or visit our website, your IP address, as well as the start and end of the session, will be recorded. This is technically necessary and therefore constitutes a legitimate interest in accordance with Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.

contact.contactDescription: If you contact us either via our contact form on our website or by email, the data you provide will be stored with us for six months for the purpose of processing your request or in case of follow-up questions. Your transmitted data will not be shared without your consent.

cookies.cookiesDescription: Our website uses so-called cookies. These are small text files that are stored on your device with the help of the browser. They do not cause any damage. We use cookies to make our website more user-friendly. Some cookies remain stored on your device until you delete them. They allow us to recognize your browser during your next visit. If you do not want this, you can configure your browser to inform you about the setting of cookies and only allow them in individual cases. Disabling cookies may limit the functionality of our website.

serverLogFiles.LogFilesDescription: This website and the associated provider automatically collect information during the use of the website in the form of so-called "server log files." This specifically includes:

list.li3: Length of stay on the website as well as date and time
list.li6: "Leaving page" (on which URL did the user leave the website)

serverLogFiles.addition: This information collected is not processed on a personal basis or associated with personal data.
serverLogFiles.addition2: The website operator reserves the right to evaluate or check this data if illegal activities become known.

rights.h2: Your rights as a data subject
rights.rightsDescription: As a data subject, you generally have the right to:

list.li5: Revocation and objection to data processing

rights.addition: If you suspect that data protection law violations have occurred in the course of processing your data, you have the opportunity to complain to us (pesendorfer.gerald@hotmail.com) or the data protection authority.
